errors.error_description: The command to activate the virtual environment, `venv/bin/activate`, is incorrect. On Linux/macOS, it needs to be sourced by the shell using `source venv/bin/activate` or `. venv/bin/activate`.
correction_candidates: Add `chmod +x venv/bin/activate` before running the command.
For Windows, the command should be `venv\Scripts\activate`.
